description:
Set in the grand blue skies up above, the depths of darkness, elder sisters, knights, gentlemen, Vyrn lovers― all the colorful crew members will get to shine in a whole new light! "Kept you waiting, huh? It's time for you to see our final forms!" Join us and take flight to the world in the skies!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

node.description:
[Website](https://www.cygames.co.jp)

Cygames, Inc. is a Japanese video game development studio established in 2011 by CyberAgent, Inc.
In 2016 Cygames announced the establishment of an anime studio [CygamesPictures](https://anilist.co/studio/6182/). The company also began funding anime for its mobile property and for new projects and adaptations for anime. The company also entered the manga, music and design market in the time period.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/濱野高年)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule.
